text: Hymenophyllum alveolatum is a species of fern in the family Hymenophyllaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== alveolatum Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hymenophyllum alveolatum
